---
title: "About"
---

This website demonstrates the action of [Vector Symbolic Architecture](https://www.hd-computing.com/) operators by projecting the hypervectors to the surface of a sphere.

This is the work of [Ross W. Gayler](https://www.rossgayler.com/) and [Jeff Orchard](https://cs.uwaterloo.ca/~jorchard/).
